segments.text: Doctor , I slipped and fell on my way to school . The ground is so slippery from the snow . It seems I can't move my left arm now .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Let me see . Roll up your sleeve , please . Um ... it's swollen and red here . I'm afraid we'll need to take an X-ray to see if it's broken .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Then we'll put you in a cast .
segments.speaker: S2
